Dating: 22ND DYNASTY (not before); 3RD INTERMEDIATE PERIOD; 26TH DYNASTY (not after)
Name: Shabti of Pasenhor
Description: Pasenhor's shabti, found in Herakleopolis Magna, with tripartite wig. His hands are shown together over his chest, holding impelments. There is a small bag of seeds on the back and an inscription on the front.
